result.name: tagged-fish-database
result.notes:
Historical fish tagging release and recapture data. Consists of both paper and 
electronic records, as well as biological material collections (otoliths) from 
the 1940s onwards. Currently there are over 200,000 release, and a 
corresponding 50,000 recapture records captured electronically by the Tagged 
Fish Database. A similar number of records remain undatabased.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
